title: What Do Children Learn in Grade 1 Math?
excerpt: A complete overview of the curriculum: addition and subtraction up to 20, number recognition, and basic geometry.
author: Smart Worksheets Team
content:
The Foundation for the Future

In Grade 1, children build their understanding of numbers. The main goals:

  • Addition and subtraction within 20
  • Number recognition up to 100
  • Identifying basic geometric shapes

Practice these topics with Grade 1 worksheets.
